widgets_values: sanity check that all the args are chosen correctly

For multiresolution training, input same source directory with different dataset resolution. From what I hear, Flux likes multiple resolutions.

For single resolution training, just add single dataset.

nodes.title: Sample Prompts
widgets_values:
a giant cantaloupe on the beach at sunset, deluxepaint| 

an evil wizard fighting a beastly orc, dnd, deluxepaint|

an old medieval village and castle bustling with life, deluxepaint|

a deluxepaint image of marilyn monroe fighting jfk| 

deluxepaint full english breakfast

You can use same models as you use for inference in Comfy. When fp8_base is enabled, the model is downcasted to torch.float_e4m3fn on initialize, meaning if you load fp8 model here it should also be in same format.
Validation sampling settings are set here for all the sampler nodes.
